item.title: LSceneLLM: Enhancing Large 3D Scene Understanding Using Adaptive Visual Preferences
item.description: LSceneLLM boosts large 3D scene understanding by adaptively focusing on task-relevant visual details using LLMs’ visual preferences, surpassing existing methods on multiple benchmarks.
